headline: Live Nation price target raised to $155 from $146 at Guggenheim
summary: Guggenheim raised the firm’s price target on Live Nation (LYV) to $155 from $146 and keeps a Buy rating on the shares after having updated the firm’s model to reflect a record large-venue slate next year, “robust leading indicators,” and continued execution across the “opportunity buckets laid out by management in their recent investor presentation.” Published first on TheFly – the ultimate source for real-time, market-moving breaking financial news.
